sentences.en: "What a marvelous carving!" the starving harvester in vest said.
sentences.cn: “好一件神奇的雕刻！”挨饿的穿着背心的收割者说。

sentences.en: At present service group already had tractor, large combine harvester , drill 24.
sentences.cn: 目前服务队已拥有拖拉机 、 大型联合收割机 、 播种机24台.

sentences.en: Both of Oscar's hind legs were accidentally chopped off in a combine harvester.
sentences.cn: 奥斯卡的两只后腿不小心被一台联合收割机截断。

sentences.en: He was the man who invented the combine harvester.
sentences.cn: 他就是发明联合收割机的人.

sentences.en: His father works in accounting finance in International Harvester.
sentences.cn: 他的爸爸在“国际丰收公司”作会计和金融工作.

sentences.en: I have waited long enough ! Now , you face the harvester of souls!
sentences.cn: 我已经等待很久 啦, 现在你们将面对灵魂的收割者.

sentences.en: In 1972, International Harvester, Ford, Chrysler, General Motors and Volvo applied for suspensions.
sentences.cn: 1972年, 国际收割机械公司 、 福特汽车公司 、 克莱斯勒汽车公司 、 通用汽车公司和沃尔沃汽车公司都申请了缓期.

sentences.en: In the roaring of combine harvester rumble, they are laughing tenaciously.
sentences.cn: 在联合收割机隆隆的吼声中, 他们仍然顽强地笑着.

sentences.en: Mind control a refinery a docked harvester.
sentences.cn: 那就控制一座有矿车停靠的矿厂吧.

sentences.en: News 5 : harvester factory in Guangxi province to sell again.
sentences.cn: 企业新闻 一: 江苏省建湖县收割机厂,再次申请专利.

sentences.en: Research on the design of Combine Harvester Model 4 L - 110.
sentences.cn: 4L-110型谷物联合收割机的设计研究.

sentences.en: The chief limitation of the harvester has been its inability to separate seed from debris.
sentences.cn: 这种扫集机的主要缺点是不能把种子和夹杂物分开来.

sentences.en: The chief limitation of the harvester is its inability to separate seed from debris.
sentences.cn: 这种收割机的主要缺点是不能把种子和夹杂物分开来.

sentences.en: This will prevent the harvester from popping out of the refinery.
sentences.cn: 这样你的矿车就不会从矿场里出来.

sentences.en: With the combine harvester, our agriculture has realized scale production.
sentences.cn: 有了联合收割机, 我们的农业生产实现了规模化.

sentences.en: You have fought hard to invade the realm of the harvester.
sentences.cn: 你入侵到了收割机的领域.
